sections.code:
/* These extra @-moz-document definitions will not be included in the "grunt user"
  * build because Chrome Stylish puts these extra definitions into separate sections
  * with separate regexp/domain definitions.
  * If the css below changes, it will have to be manually updated
  */
/* === StackExchange tweaks === _                 _
  | |_ _ _ _ ___ ___| |_ ___
  |  _| | | | -_| .'| '_|_ -|
  |_| |_____|___|__,|_,_|___|
 */

usercssData.name: Stack Overflow Dark
usercssData.description: Dark theme for Stack Overflow & most Stack Exchange network sites
usercssData.author: StylishThemes

options.name: Tiled
options.label: Tiled

options.name: Fit-window-size
options.label: Fit window size

options.name: Hemisu-Dark
options.label: Hemisu Dark
options.value: /*! Hemisu Dark */.prettyprint{background:black!important;font-family:Menlo,'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono','DejaVu Sans Mono',Monaco,Consolas,monospace!important;padding:10px!important}.pln{color:#eee!important}@media screen{.str{color:#b1d631!important}.kwd{color:#b1d631!important}.com{color:#777!important}.typ{color:#bfa!important}.lit{color:#9fd3e6!important}.pun{color:#eee!important}.opn{color:#eee!important}.clo{color:#eee!important}.tag{color:#eee!important}.atn{color:#b1d631!important}.atv{color:#bfa!important}.dec{color:#eee!important}.var{color:#eee!important}.fun{color:#9fd3e6!important}}@media print,projection{.str{color:#060!important}.kwd{color:#006!important;font-weight:bold!important}.com{color:#600!important;font-style:italic!important}.typ{color:#404!important;font-weight:bold!important}.lit{color:#044!important}.pun,.opn,.clo{color:#440!important}.tag{color:#006!important;font-weight:bold!important}.atn{color:#404!important}.atv{color:#060!important}}ol.linenums{margin-top:0!important;margin-bottom:0!important}
